snippet.title: Loopy Particle Simulator
snippet.description:
This is a game I made in 72h for Ludum Dare game jam. In the video, I show a complete circuit that makes all products in the game. If you also want to construct a particule accelerator, you can play the game, there is tutorial levels and a freeplay mode! Send me a picture of your result on twitter!
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/loopy-particle-simulator
